name: Art Master: Jigsaw Game
description:
Art Master is a new game where you need to restore a picture from parts!

Find a suitable place for the piece in the picture and drag it there!
Relax and have fun.

Features of the game:
- New, unique gaming experience;
- An excellent combination of two genres - puzzles and coloring books;
- Unique pictures that you have to bring to life.
- Free hints;


Such a simple and cool app to relax and improve your powers of observation. What else do you need?
Try to download and play now!
